content: this lively crochet scarf lets you play with patterns in a bold way designed using 5 shades of red heart super saver you can make this fun version or dive right into the full range of colors available endless possibilities for the creative maker practice single_crochet experiment with simple colorwork and add playful tassels all while honing your skills choose their favorite colors to create a gift that s sure to be treasured materials red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a soft white 316 1 ball contrast b blue 0886 1 ball contrast c pretty n pink 0722 1 ball contrast d gold 0321 1 ball contrast e pale plum 0579 1 ball measurements approx 8½ 21 5 cm wide x 70½ 179 cm long excluding tassels
